ingredient_breakdown: Flour Tortilla (enriched wheat flour, water, vegetable shortening/lard, salt, baking powder, dough conditioners)
Scrambled Eggs (whole eggs, possibly milk/cream, salt, black pepper, cooked with butter/oil)
Diced Potatoes (potatoes, cooking oil, salt, black pepper, possibly garlic powder, onion powder, paprika)
Cooked Meat (likely pork sausage: pork, salt, spices like sage, black pepper, red pepper; or bacon bits)
Cheese (likely melted into the filling, e.g., cheddar, Monterey Jack, or a blend)
Sauce (in small container: appears light-colored, possibly sour cream, a creamy mild salsa, or a mild hot sauce)
Aromatics (likely minced onions, garlic sautéed with other ingredients)
Cooking Fats (vegetable oil, butter, lard used for cooking eggs, potatoes, meat)
Seasonings (salt, black pepper, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, paprika)
